name: Hell A Fun!!
description:
Hell, the happiest place ever lies without the great ruler, so the powers that be created the most insane party to choose who will be the one to wear the crown of hell…..

Hell-A-Fun! is an insane and hilarious local multiplayer party game for up to 4 players, centering around eight different arena types and mini games, that makes versus matches a chaotic experience that will test your skills using simple mechanics. Get familiar with each game, that goes between team matches or free-4-all by having some quick fun or enter the tournament mode and prove your knowledge of each game having all the fun. Choose among the four greatest and ascend the throne of the great party.

It is recommended that you and your friends (or enemies) play this game with controllers. Hell-A-Fun! supports many varieties of controllers, including PS4 and XBox 360.

Features:

  • Eight hilarious and insane games, each one with its own rules and winning rules that will test your strategy and skill.
  • Four cute and powerful characters that can wear different hats. Choose your own style for your favorite one.
  • Cute and beautiful art and animations focussed on hell, the happiest place ever.
  • An amazing ost that will stay in your mind as a friend singing delicious bits.
